annotations.description: The Smoke and Mirrors was created by Alex Day who was an early bartender at Death & Co. in New York and then went on to partner with David Kaplan (Death & Co...
annotations.title: Smoke and Mirrors A Scotch Cocktail

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Islay Scotch
1oz (30ml) Blended Scotch
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice 
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
4-5 Mint Leaves
Top with Spray of Absinthe
Garnish Float Mint Leaf

Muddle mint with syrup and lime juice
Add ingredients, shake, and double strain into coupe
Spray with absinthe and garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cIUKEJXPFEQ
title: Smoke and Mirrors
